/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The buildings on either side of the street are adorned with colorful murals, adding a vibrant and artistic flair to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the scene.
